1.title: Kids' Choice Slime Testing Behind-the-Scenes
1.plot: Go behind the scenes of the Nickelodeon slime laboratory with the ultimate Nick fans, Carly and Tarreyn. And don't miss hanging out with the cast of Knight Squad, exploring the animation studio, and touring the Paramount movie lot, all coming soon to Inside Nick.

2.title: Kira Kosarin Shares How to Make a Perfect Selfie & More!
2.plot: Go behind the scenes of Knight Squad and the Paramount movie studio, get selfie advice from Kira Kosarin, and learn how to be the ultimate Nick star with Owen Joyner and Daniella Perkins in this star-packed episode of Inside Nick.

3.title: Nickelodeon's Animation Studio Tour: SpongeBob & Lincoln Loud
3.plot: Go behind the scenes at the Nickelodeon Animation Studio and see where SpongeBob is made, meet up with Lincoln Loud, explore the Slimezone VR experience, and more.

4.title: Cart Quiz w/ Owen Joyner, Is a Hot Dog a Sandwich? & More!
4.plot: Is a hot dog a sandwich? Cake or Pie? Favorite pizza topping? Owen Joyner (Arc) gets a cart ride to the Knight Squad set from the ultimate Nick fans, Carly and Terreyn, but only if he can answer all of their questions.

5.title: Special Effects Spectacular w/ Kira Kosarin & Jack Griffo
5.plot: Ultimate Nick insiders Carly and Tarreyn go on a journey into the world of Nickelodeon's stunts and special effects and show you how your favorite moments were created. They also talk to Kira Kosarin about her superpowers and ALMOST meet Jack Griffo.

6.title: How to Make a Nickelodeon Cartoon
6.plot: Learn how your favorite Nickelodeon cartoons are made, who does the voices, and how to draw your favorite characters. Plus, Carly and Tarreyn take you deep into the Nickelodeon vault and show you what's hidden inside.

7.title: BTS of Slimefest w/ JoJo Siwa, Liam Payne & More
7.plot: This time on Inside Nick, come with us to Chicago for Nickelodeon's very own music festival, Slimefest. Tarreyn and Carly catch up with JoJo Siwa, Liam Payne, Zedd, Flo Rida and Owen Joyner. They're definitely having the SLIME of their lives.

8.title: VidCon Scavenger Hunt w/ JoJo Siwa, Knight Squad & New TMNT
8.plot: Ultimate Nick fans Carly and Tarreyn have a scavenger hunt at VidCon and they can't finish it without the help of JoJo Siwa, Owen Joyner, Daniella Perkins, Lilimar, and the new Rise of the TMNT.

9.title: BTS of Double Dare w/ Liza Koshy, Marc Summers & More!
9.plot: Carly and Tarreyn get messy at Double Dare with hosts Liza Koshy and Marc Summers. And don't miss the special celebrity contestants like LaurDIY, Alex Wassabi, and Kenan and Kel. Catch all the slime, obstacles, and physical challenges in a way you've never seen before.

10.title: JoJo Siwa, BTS, Deleted Scenes & More for a Star-Studded Finale
10.plot: It's a star-studded spectacular season finale with JoJo Siwa, Kira Kosarin, Riele Downs, Breanna Yde, Madisyn Shipman, Marc Summers, Butch Hartman, Jack Griffo, and Kel Mitchell. Plus, there are bloopers, BTS moments, deleted scenes and so much more.
